local aTimer = nil
local aTimerInterval = 1000
local aTimerTicks = 0
local aTimerTickMax = 0
local function aTimer_tick(timer)
   if aTimerTickMax > 0 and aTimerTicks >= aTimerTickMax then
      timer.destroy()
   end
   aTimerTicks = aTimerTicks + 1
   openProcess("RecRoom.exe")
   if b == 0 or b == 255 then
      openProcess("RecRoom.exe")
   end

end

function AOBRep(search, change)
local aob = AOBScan(search)
if aob then
  for i=0,aob.Count-1 do
    autoAssemble(aob[i]..':\ndb '..change)
  end
  aob.Destroy()
end
end

function class()
   -- Item Swaps
-- 2020 Shirt
-- Swaps Fire Fighter Shirt
searchA = '31 00 62 00 33 00 37 00 64 00 36 00 63 00 64 00 2D 00 30 00 61 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 30 00 34 00 2D 00 61 00 30 00 34 00 36 00 2D 00 65 00 35 00 63 00 66 00 66 00 35 00 35 00 62 00 30 00 63 00 66 00 36 00'
replaceA = '62 00 33 00 39 00 34 00 39 00 32 00 32 00 31 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 31 00 36 00 2D 00 34 00 61 00 66 00 65 00 2D 00 38 00 37 00 37 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 30 00 66 00 30 00 31 00 65 00 63 00 34 00 63 00 31 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchA,replaceA)
-- 2021
-- Swaps Trucker Jacket Wrist
searchQ = '39 00 37 00 33 00 64 00 38 00 34 00 65 00 65 00 2D 00 35 00 62 00 38 00 38 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 35 00 63 00 2D 00 62 00 35 00 37 00 39 00 2D 00 61 00 37 00 36 00 63 00 33 00 34 00 61 00 37 00 63 00 35 00 33 00 33 00'
replaceQ = '36 00 31 00 38 00 62 00 39 00 37 00 39 00 65 00 2D 00 63 00 36 00 65 00 36 00 2D 00 34 00 33 00 34 00 65 00 2D 00 39 00 38 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 35 00 31 00 65 00 31 00 31 00 37 00 66 00 62 00 36 00 39 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
-- 2022
-- Swaps Cowboy Gloves
searchR = '39 00 65 00 62 00 37 00 66 00 35 00 30 00 35 00 2D 00 35 00 61 00 66 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 32 00 38 00 2D 00 39 00 38 00 38 00 36 00 2D 00 37 00 39 00 39 00 36 00 64 00 33 00 38 00 63 00 35 00 39 00 63 00 36 00'
replaceR = '36 00 31 00 38 00 62 00 39 00 37 00 39 00 65 00 2D 00 63 00 36 00 65 00 36 00 2D 00 34 00 33 00 34 00 65 00 2D 00 39 00 38 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 35 00 31 00 65 00 31 00 31 00 37 00 66 00 62 00 36 00 39 00'
AOBRep(searchR,replaceR)
-- 2023
-- Swaps Over Flowing Book Bag
searchS = '61 00 39 00 34 00 30 00 34 00 38 00 31 00 38 00 2D 00 64 00 37 00 64 00 30 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 36 00 31 00 2D 00 38 00 65 00 62 00 38 00 2D 00 39 00 30 00 66 00 32 00 33 00 65 00 38 00 32 00 31 00 31 00 35 00 63 00'
replaceS = '31 00 39 00 34 00 30 00 63 00 37 00 34 00 30 00 2D 00 36 00 39 00 35 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 61 00 38 00 30 00 32 00 2D 00 62 00 62 00 31 00 31 00 62 00 36 00 35 00 36 00 31 00 36 00 33 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchS,replaceS)
-- Texture Swaps For Class Of Shirts
-- 2021
searchK = '79 00 41 00 30 00 4B 00 68 00 56 00 67 00 31 00 39 00 6B 00 57 00 71 00 47 00 31 00 55 00 6B 00 79 00 78 00 51 00 6F 00 67 00 51 00 2C 00 79 00 42 00 4E 00 73 00 59 00 63 00 5A 00 58 00 7A 00 45 00 69 00 75 00 52 00 30 00 75 00 33 00 74 00 57 00 6E 00 6E 00 57 00 51 00'
replaceK = '76 00 74 00 58 00 55 00 79 00 75 00 2D 00 78 00 6D 00 6B 00 61 00 59 00 74 00 4F 00 43 00 4C 00 39 00 72 00 33 00 50 00 73 00 41 00 2C 00 56 00 74 00 65 00 70 00 61 00 49 00 32 00 66 00 76 00 55 00 57 00 68 00 63 00 76 00 4E 00 6D 00 70 00 51 00 38 00 72 00 36 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchK,replaceK)
-- 2022
searchL = '72 00 66 00 49 00 7A 00 51 00 6A 00 78 00 65 00 52 00 55 00 36 00 30 00 56 00 64 00 52 00 51 00 58 00 47 00 39 00 43 00 63 00 77 00'
replaceL = '57 00 5F 00 52 00 77 00 6E 00 79 00 53 00 42 00 4D 00 6B 00 32 00 47 00 6C 00 72 00 6B 00 6E 00 4D 00 37 00 4E 00 44 00 72 00 67 00'
AOBRep(searchL,replaceL)
-- 2023
searchQ = '30 00 38 00 35 00 39 00 33 00 64 00 39 00 66 00 2D 00 61 00 61 00 65 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 37 00 33 00 64 00 2D 00 30 00 66 00 33 00 30 00 65 00 37 00 37 00 66 00 31 00 39 00 35 00 35 00'
replaceQ = '62 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 64 00 38 00 30 00 30 00 2D 00 64 00 33 00 30 00 36 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 37 00 62 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 62 00 34 00 2D 00 66 00 30 00 34 00 32 00 37 00 38 00 38 00 34 00 34 00 39 00 62 00 61 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
-- Text Swaps
searchQ = '43 00 6F 00 77 00 62 00 6F 00 79 00 20 00 47 00 6C 00 6F 00 76 00 65 00 73 00 20 00 28 00 50 00 69 00 6E 00 6B 00 29 00'
replaceQ = '43 00 6C 00 61 00 73 00 73 00 20 00 4F 00 66 00 20 00 32 00 30 00 32 00 32 00 20 00 28 00 54 00 65 00 73 00 74 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
searchQ = '54 00 72 00 75 00 63 00 6B 00 65 00 72 00 20 00 43 00 75 00 66 00 66 00 20 00 28 00 57 00 68 00 69 00 74 00 65 00 29 00'
replaceQ = '43 00 6C 00 61 00 73 00 73 00 20 00 4F 00 66 00 20 00 32 00 30 00 32 00 31 00 20 00 28 00 54 00 65 00 73 00 74 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
searchQ = '46 00 69 00 72 00 65 00 66 00 69 00 67 00 68 00 74 00 65 00 72 00 20 00 4A 00 61 00 63 00 6B 00 65 00 74 00'
replaceQ = '32 00 30 00 32 00 30 00 20 00 43 00 6C 00 61 00 73 00 73 00 21 00 20 00 28 00 54 00 65 00 73 00 74 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
searchQ = '4F 00 76 00 65 00 72 00 66 00 6C 00 6F 00 77 00 69 00 6E 00 67 00 20 00 42 00 6F 00 6F 00 6B 00 20 00 42 00 61 00 67 00 20 00 28 00 47 00 72 00 65 00 65 00 6E 00 29 00'
replaceQ = '43 00 6C 00 61 00 73 00 73 00 20 00 4F 00 66 00 20 00 32 00 30 00 32 00 33 00 20 00 28 00 54 00 65 00 73 00 74 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchQ,replaceQ)
end

function poofy()
-- Item Swaps
-- Yellow Poofy Dress
-- Swaps Bow Tie
searchC = '38 00 33 00 62 00 65 00 35 00 62 00 61 00 34 00 2D 00 35 00 32 00 35 00 61 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 66 00 36 00 2D 00 38 00 33 00 39 00 63 00 32 00 32 00 65 00 34 00 64 00 31 00 64 00 33 00'
replaceC = '61 00 33 00 30 00 32 00 37 00 34 00 31 00 64 00 2D 00 33 00 31 00 33 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 38 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 32 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 37 00 36 00 34 00 65 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchC,replaceC)
-- Purple Poofy
-- Swaps Lacrosse Helm
searchH = '37 00 31 00 33 00 34 00 63 00 36 00 30 00 62 00 2D 00 30 00 36 00 34 00 30 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 33 00 61 00 2D 00 38 00 64 00 39 00 37 00 2D 00 63 00 61 00 61 00 39 00 31 00 38 00 34 00 62 00 65 00 66 00 39 00 33 00'
replaceH = '61 00 33 00 30 00 32 00 37 00 34 00 31 00 64 00 2D 00 33 00 31 00 33 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 38 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 32 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 37 00 36 00 34 00 65 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchH,replaceH)
-- Orange Poofy
-- Swaps Lacrosse Shirt
searchI = '33 00 39 00 32 00 37 00 38 00 33 00 30 00 32 00 2D 00 62 00 35 00 32 00 61 00 2D 00 34 00 38 00 61 00 38 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 36 00 36 00 2D 00 65 00 64 00 37 00 35 00 36 00 61 00 35 00 66 00 61 00 31 00 61 00 39 00'
replaceI = '61 00 33 00 30 00 32 00 37 00 34 00 31 00 64 00 2D 00 33 00 31 00 33 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 38 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 32 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 37 00 36 00 34 00 65 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchI,replaceI)
-- Blue Poofy
-- Luchador Shirt Blue
searchU = '39 00 63 00 33 00 34 00 63 00 32 00 63 00 31 00 2D 00 30 00 37 00 64 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 31 00 38 00 30 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 61 00 32 00 2D 00 62 00 65 00 38 00 63 00 39 00 63 00 61 00 61 00 61 00 65 00 38 00 34 00'
replaceU = '61 00 33 00 30 00 32 00 37 00 34 00 31 00 64 00 2D 00 33 00 31 00 33 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 38 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 32 00 65 00 35 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 37 00 36 00 34 00 65 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchU,replaceU)
-- -------------------------------------------------
-- Textures For Poofy's
-- Blue Poofy
searchD = '30 00 32 00 31 00 37 00 66 00 64 00 32 00 65 00 2D 00 66 00 66 00 39 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 39 00 66 00 37 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 63 00 38 00 2D 00 38 00 64 00 30 00 64 00 36 00 62 00 38 00 62 00 66 00 32 00 35 00 30 00 2C 00 37 00 65 00 66 00 37 00 64 00 30 00 63 00 66 00 2D 00 39 00 39 00 66 00 31 00 2D 00 34 00 38 00 37 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 64 00 33 00 64 00 2D 00 38 00 32 00 33 00 30 00 63 00 63 00 39 00 66 00 61 00 33 00 36 00 38 00'
replaceD = '35 00 35 00 39 00 30 00 31 00 66 00 31 00 32 00 2D 00 64 00 35 00 62 00 35 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 61 00 38 00 2D 00 62 00 34 00 63 00 38 00 2D 00 65 00 34 00 37 00 39 00 36 00 38 00 39 00 65 00 65 00 33 00 39 00 64 00 2C 00 64 00 33 00 30 00 65 00 33 00 61 00 66 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 31 00 34 00 63 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 30 00 2D 00 38 00 62 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 36 00 66 00 61 00 34 00 31 00 35 00 36 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchD,replaceD)
-- Purple Poofy
searchE = '65 00 33 00 34 00 35 00 34 00 62 00 63 00 37 00 2D 00 63 00 38 00 38 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 39 00 35 00 38 00 2D 00 38 00 62 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 64 00 62 00 33 00 66 00 65 00 35 00 34 00 37 00 32 00 61 00 31 00 65 00 2C 00 37 00 65 00 36 00 38 00 38 00 62 00 33 00 30 00 2D 00 65 00 64 00 31 00 33 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 39 00 30 00 2D 00 39 00 61 00 64 00 38 00 2D 00 63 00 34 00 39 00 38 00 38 00 35 00 64 00 31 00 62 00 37 00 65 00 38 00'
replaceE = '33 00 31 00 61 00 63 00 39 00 64 00 34 00 64 00 2D 00 33 00 64 00 36 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 38 00 66 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 35 00 64 00 35 00 2D 00 64 00 63 00 34 00 62 00 38 00 31 00 36 00 35 00 61 00 31 00 37 00 61 00 2C 00 64 00 33 00 30 00 65 00 33 00 61 00 66 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 31 00 34 00 63 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 30 00 2D 00 38 00 62 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 36 00 66 00 61 00 34 00 31 00 35 00 36 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchE,replaceE)
-- Orange Poofy
searchG = '65 00 33 00 34 00 35 00 34 00 62 00 63 00 37 00 2D 00 63 00 38 00 38 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 39 00 35 00 38 00 2D 00 38 00 62 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 64 00 62 00 33 00 66 00 65 00 35 00 34 00 37 00 32 00 61 00 31 00 65 00 2C 00 64 00 61 00 33 00 36 00 62 00 62 00 63 00 63 00 2D 00 32 00 61 00 39 00 61 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 61 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 65 00 34 00 61 00 2D 00 36 00 66 00 35 00 32 00 63 00 39 00 62 00 31 00 65 00 66 00 37 00 34 00'
replaceG = '36 00 34 00 38 00 35 00 30 00 35 00 35 00 33 00 2D 00 63 00 64 00 66 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 35 00 35 00 61 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 30 00 30 00 2D 00 64 00 61 00 66 00 62 00 65 00 36 00 33 00 64 00 36 00 31 00 33 00 65 00 2C 00 64 00 33 00 30 00 65 00 33 00 61 00 66 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 31 00 34 00 63 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 30 00 2D 00 38 00 62 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 36 00 66 00 61 00 34 00 31 00 35 00 36 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchG,replaceG)
-- Name Swaps
searchY = '4C 00 75 00 63 00 68 00 61 00 64 00 6F 00 72 00 20 00 53 00 69 00 6E 00 67 00 6C 00 65 00 74 00 20 00 28 00 47 00 72 00 65 00 65 00 6E 00 29 00'
replaceY = '59 00 65 00 6C 00 6C 00 6F 00 77 00 20 00 50 00 6F 00 6F 00 66 00 79 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 28 00 52 00 33 00 21 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchY,replaceY)
searchY = '4C 00 75 00 63 00 68 00 61 00 64 00 6F 00 72 00 20 00 53 00 69 00 6E 00 67 00 6C 00 65 00 74 00 20 00 28 00 42 00 6C 00 75 00 65 00 29 00'
replaceY = '44 00 65 00 6E 00 69 00 6D 00 20 00 50 00 6F 00 6F 00 66 00 79 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 28 00 52 00 33 00 21 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchY,replaceY)
searchY = '4C 00 61 00 63 00 72 00 6F 00 73 00 73 00 65 00 20 00 48 00 65 00 6C 00 6D 00 65 00 74 00 20 00 28 00 50 00 69 00 6E 00 6B 00 29 00'
replaceY = '50 00 75 00 72 00 70 00 6C 00 65 00 20 00 50 00 6F 00 6F 00 66 00 79 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 28 00 52 00 33 00 21 00 29 00'
AOBRep(searchY,replaceY)
searchY = '4C 00 61 00 63 00 72 00 6F 00 73 00 73 00 65 00 20 00 53 00 68 00 69 00 72 00 74 00 20 00 28 00 50 00 69 00 6E 00 6B 00 29 00'
replaceY = '4F 00 72 00 61 00 6E 00 67 00 65 00 20 00 50 00 6F 00 6F 00 66 00 79 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 28 00 52 00 33 00 21 00 29 00 20 00'
AOBRep(searchY,replaceY)
end

MyForm = createForm(true)
MyForm.caption = [[ Made By Ｈｙｐｗｅｒ For EndClumsy]]
MyForm.Width = 350
MyForm.Height = 200
MyForm.Color = 0x10009

shbf = createButton(MyForm)
shbf.Left = 30
shbf.Top = 35
shbf.Width = 125
shbf.Height = 40
shbf.onClick = class
shbf.Caption = 'Class Of Shirts'

shbf = createButton(MyForm)
shbf.Left = 30
shbf.Top = 80
shbf.Width = 125
shbf.Height = 40
shbf.onClick = poofy
shbf.Caption = 'Poofy Dress'

function AOBRep(search, change)
local aob = AOBScan(search)
if aob then
  for i=0,aob.Count-1 do
    autoAssemble(aob[i]..':\ndb '..change)
  end
  aob.Destroy()
end
end
